actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Hatch with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 674.

official_title: A bill to provide for enhanced Federal sentencing guidelines for counterfeiting offenses, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the United States Sentencing Commission to amend the Federal sentencing guidelines to provide: (1) a sentencing enhancement of at least two levels for offenses involving counterfeit bearer obligations of the United States; and (2) an additional sentencing enhancement of at least two levels with respect to any such offense involving the use of a computer printer or a color photocopying machine. Amends the Federal criminal code to apply the prohibition against falsely making, forging, counterfeiting, or altering any U.S. obligation or security with intent to defraud to attempting to do so.

titles.title: A bill to provide for enhanced Federal sentencing guidelines for counterfeiting offenses, and for other purposes.
